info.title: Product Catalog API
info.description: This is Infracommerce Product Catalog API documentation. Here you will find operations to browse your product catalog. You will be able to search for products, navigate trough the website category tree and get detailed product and sku information.

tags.name: Product & SKU API
tags.description: Product Catalog API provides operations for you to search for products/SKUs and get detailed information using id-based operations. Search is extremely powerful, performed using lexical search. It is the same search engine used in the website.

tags.name: Category Tree API
tags.description: Product Catalog API provideone single and extremelly powerful operation for you to browse the website category tree. You will be able to get the category tree, with or without products, starting from any note in the tree.

get.summary: Retrieve a SKU by its ID
get.description: This API operation will return a complete set of information of the SKU. THis will include user define attributes, images, prices, installment information and anything else that you might need to render a SKU information page.

204.description: SKU not found or not available.

get.summary: Retrieve a product by its ID
get.description: This API operation will return a complete set of information of the Product. This will include user define attributes, images, prices, installment information and anything else that you might need to render a product information page. You will also get a list of all available SKUs, with a minimum set of data.

200.description: Detailed information for this Product. The response uses the same schema as an SKU, but it is actually a merge of information from the product and its main SKU.

204.description: Product not found or not available.

post.summary: Retrieve a list of SKUs by ID
post.description: This API operation will return a simplified version of the SKU. It will take as input a list of SKU IDs and return a list of SKU information.

200.description: Detailed information for this SKU list.

204.description: SKUs not found or not available.

post.description: This API operation will search for SKUs based on the term provided. It will return a list os SKUs that match, including all its variations (colors, sizes, etc.)

searchText.description: Term to use in the search

200.description: List of SKUs that match the term provided

204.description: SKUs not found or not available.

get.description: This API operation will allow you to browse through the website structure and categories.

parameters.name: fatherId
parameters.description: This is the category ID. If you do not provide this, this API operation will use the "root" node as base to build the category tree.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: The depth that the API operation will dive into to build the category tree. If not provided, it will assume the default value of "1". It can be up to "3".

parameters.name: showProduct
parameters.description: Boolean flag to tell if products will also be fetched as set as category attributes. Default value is "false"

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of category node. If you provide "fatherId" attribute, please also provide this attribute with the value "standard".

Pagination.description: Pagination information. This object contains links according to HyperMedia standard.

pageStart.description: In which item this page ends

itemsTotal.description: Total number of itens in listing

maximumSellingQuantity.description: Maximum number of pieces of this SKU that can be sold in a single order

minimumSellingQuantity.description: Minimum number of pieces of this SKU that the customer needs to add to his/her shopping cart in order to be able to place an order

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure used in this SKU (PC, KG, M, etc)

unitPrice.description: Sale price of this product. This price will be the final price, with discounts already applied

numberOfUnit.description: If this is a pack, this will contain the number of units in this pack.

ownBrand.description: true if this product is a "own brand" product.

urlProductHome.description: URL for the product in the website

variableWeightFlag.description: If this product has to be sold by its unit (by KG, or by Liter)

rating.description: Product rating in internal Infrashop rating engine.

defaultPrice.description: List price. This won't have any eventual promotions

priceOfUnit.description: If this is unit based sold, this will have the price by unit.

available.description: Number of pieces available for sale

variationList.description: Variation list array. You will fing all variations - different sizes, flavors, colors, etc - of other SKUs in this same product.

SKUImages.description: SKU Image information. In order to build a complete image URL, use base_url + "/" + XXX + "/" + image_XXX (where XXX is the image size) + "_" + ean + ".jpg". Example- if base_url is "http-//i-mystore.a8e.net.br/", the image size you want is "gg", image_gg is "57181576" and ean is "902947", the complete URL will be "http-//i-mystore.a8e.net.br/gg/57181576_902947.jpg". Please notice that the attributes image_XXX are dynamic and will reflect the sizes you have configured.

ean.description: SKU EAN used to build this image URL

image_XXX.description: Image type ID array. The first element in the array is the main image.

Variation.description: This maps a product variation. It contains a minimum set of data for you to build a selection grid

available.description: Number of pieces available for sale

uda.description: User defined attribute name list. If you want the uda value, take the same index in "valuesUda" array.

main.description: true is this is the main SKU of this product.

leadTime.description: SKU lead time. This will be added in delivery time when calculating freight for this SKU.

visible.description: Y if this product is visible, N otherwise.

comercialStatus.description: Y if this product has a valid commercial status and can be sold. N otherwise.

fiscalStatus.description: Y if this product has a valid fiscal status and can be sold. Notherwise.

salesClassification.description: SKU sale classification. "A" is a top seller, "B" is a above average seller, "C" is a regular selling SKU.

service.description: true if this SKU is a service - Service SKUs do not have freight information neither weight information

forFree.description: Y if this product is a gift (free product that can only be sold through promotions), N otherwise.

crossDocking.description: Crossdocking time. This is the amount of days for this product to be available for sale. It is automatically added to delivery time when calculatint freight info.

status.description: SKU status. "A" is an active selling SKU, "C" is a canceled SKU

productionStatus.description: Y if this product has all production data, N otherwise.

productTypeSource.description: Product type. "NOR" for normal, "FFR" for gift, "SER" for service, "KIT" for bundles.

sellingTitleShort.description: Product short selling title (up to 56 chars)

main.description: Y if this is the main SKU in this product, N otherwise.

essential.description: Deprecated. This attribute is here for backwards compatibility

Category.description: Category information. A category contains some basic data ans an array list that has all its children. The list is an array of "Category".

levelIdFather.description: Category father ID. If this is a string contant like "Menu", that means that this category is a root node, rendered in website's main menu

fatherName.description: Human readable father category name. If this is a string contant like "Menu", that means that this category is a root node, rendered in website's main menu

fatherNameSource.description: URL friendly father category name. If this is a string contant like "Menu", that means that this category is a root node, rendered in website's main menu

sourceBreadcrumb.description: Breadcrumb info. It is a list of name sources concatenated using the separator '#'

template.description: This is here for future use. Do not use this value

position.description: Position of this category. Render the category in the page according to this position

categories.name: VESTUÁRIO MASCULINO  BLUSAS E CALÇAS MUSCULAÇÃO
VESTUÁRIO FEMININO BLUSAS E CALÇAS MUSCULAÇÃO
